name: Pi-Rats
description:
Pi-rats is a 3D, single-player roguelike game for PC. Play as Capri, a former princess, now a pirate captain with a crew of capable rats. Earn gold by defeating rival pirates and royal ships.

While enduring volleys of cannon fire, stop by the moving turtle isles and purchase upgrades for the hull, sails, cannons & more! Buy parrots to stuff into the cannons, shark bait to attract sharks and take advantage of their destructive power and much more.

Purchase upgrades from the turtle merchants to your heart's content and become the most wanted pirate with the highest bounty on the seven seas.

Controls:
W A S D = Movement
Right / Left click = Right / Left Shoot
Right click in shop = Buy item
TAB = Additional GUI
Scroll wheel = Shooting spread
Space = Interact / Anchor
ESC = Pause
